pkgmetadata.longdescription: Non-Proportional Hazards in Randomized Controlled Trials // Perform a stratified weighted log-rank test in a randomized controlled trial. Tests can be visualized as a difference in average score on the two treatment arms. These methods are described in Magirr and Burman (2018) doi:10.48550/arXiv.1807.11097, Magirr (2020) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2007.04767, and Magirr and Jimenez (2022) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2201.10445.
